messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Springsteen is different from many other artists who sell a lot of albums. Even in his late 60s, he is still making new music that is very popular. He performs in big stadiums and is still one of the best. This does not surprise me at all. He tells the most important stories about our lives. When you listen to his album *Born in the USA*, you can see that those stories are still meaningful today.

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Springsteen is different from many other artists who sell lots of albums. He is in his late 60s, but he still makes very popular new music. He plays in big stadiums and is still one of the best. This is not a surprise to me. He tells the most important stories about people's lives. When you listen to his album *Born in the USA*, you see that those stories are still important today.
